Comments.Message: Silverlight doesn't allow you to use Reflection.Emit, so it's not possible to use code generation (that FLEE does).
I converted a previous version of Flee to Silverlight, works nicely. Emit does work but you can't specify your expression owner, it is marked as internal in Silverlight.
doozel, could you share the converted version you made? I've tried myself, but I get a lot of compile errors. And what does it mean that the Reflection.Emit is missing? Is it a crucial part of Flee?
